# dateSeparator

**Instance Property**

The character used to separate the components of a date.

## Declaration

```swift
var dateSeparator: Date.ISO8601FormatStyle.DateSeparator { get }
```

## Modifying an ISO 8601 Format Style

- **dateTimeSeparator**: The character used to separate the date and time components of an ISO 8601 string representation of a date.
- **timeZone**: The time zone used to create and parse date representations.
- **dateTimeSeparator(_:)**: Sets the character that specifies the date and time components.
